amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would increase drug costs for seniors and people with disabilities on Medicare.

action.text: Amendment SA 1690 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1690 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 185.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1690.

Amendment SA 1690 proposed by Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 1717. To create a point of order against legislation that would increase drug costs for seniors and people with disabilities on Medicare.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1690 proposed by Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 1717.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1690 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 185.
